definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Around the 4th century AD, the site of the Oita city was once called "Bungo".
sentences.chinese: 大約在公元4世紀，大分市所在地域便被稱爲豐後國。

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已經知道喪鐘甲蟲會被幽暗地域的種族用作坐騎。

sentences.english: Like geo-political conflicts or the global economy, they are too big.
sentences.chinese: 就像地域衝突或全球經濟，它們太大了。

sentences.english: European influence gradually brought an end to this regional power.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲勢力的逐漸地入侵，結束了這種地域性的霸權。

sentences.english: Don't stir up area discrimination, or it'll trigger many disharmonious sounds.
sentences.chinese: 不要搞出地域歧視來，否則會激起很多不和諧的聲音。

sentences.english: Oasis is an optimum geographic section for multi-life-forms to live and propagate together in the desert region.
sentences.chinese: 綠洲是荒漠區適宜多種生物共同生息繁衍的地域。

sentences.english: The obvious regional also reflects the imbalance in the development of CNC machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 地域性的明顯也反應了我國數控機牀發展的不均衡。

sentences.english: Particularly suited to high altitude and cold area use.
sentences.chinese: 特別適合於高原和高寒地域使用。

sentences.english: Donnison's influential cross-cultural study of housing policy.
sentences.chinese: 唐尼森對多種文化地域住房政策所作的有影響的研究。

sentences.english: And this regional satellite aerial map presents the whole Daqing municipality.
sentences.chinese: 這副地域衛星航拍圖，將整個大慶市域呈現在您面前。

sentences.english: It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
sentences.chinese: 天使或魔鬼，天堂或地域都無法從你這裏奪走它。

sentences.english: Has become"zero industrial district"nearly in many submergence areas.
sentences.chinese: 在良多淹沒地域幾乎成了“零工業區”。

sentences.english: The Pousada perfectly combines its architecture, decoration and gastronomy with the regional culture.
sentences.chinese: 望廈賓館完美的結合了地域文化的建築，裝飾和美食。

sentences.english: The eight chapters that compose The Geography of Thought map the habits of thought.
sentences.chinese: 《思維的版圖》共有八章，描繪了思想習慣的地域性。

sentences.english: This difference is ecological adaptation for Jianchang Horses to different areas.
sentences.chinese: 這種差異正是建昌馬對不同地域的生態適應。

sentences.english: Sedum alfredii Hance from two different areas were researched in this study.
sentences.chinese: 對兩種不同地域的野生東南景天進行了分析。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
